A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie could have been so much better\, but the desire to get rid of the past dominated the film. The casino scene was boring as watching the credits roll. Mary Poppins\, wow\, just wow. Unnecessary. Plot holes everywhere. Wasted characters. It felt like the directors couldn't agree on a vision from the seventh to eighth movie. Between the filler and plot holes\, I'd avoid.
